name: i Brave New World i
description:
In the decadent college life, we often lose our dreams and courage. When "I" met Chen Xi, a girl who also likes games and wears a small skirt, the time that stopped started to turn again.

The fan text AVG game "Brave New World" released by ABOUT in 2015 has been reworked and evolved into "Brave New World i". The script was completely rewritten and doubled in content, and the CG and theme were redrawn. I hope players can immerse themselves in the world of Brave New World.
